name: Don't mess with my forest!
description:
Defend your forest against hordes of bloody lumberjacks. Use your environmental powers to slap those dumbasses and get 'em outta here!

---

Controls:

WSAD - character movement

Spacebar - jump

LMB - throwing hives

---

Team:

Erdem Durmaz - programmer

Łukasz Gołębiowski - programmer

Diogenes Spodzieja - graphics / animation

Mateusz Walek - graphics / level design
